text: Ambulance is a video game written by Kent Stevenson for the Texas Instruments TI-99/4A and released by Funware in 1983 in the United States. ==Gameplay== The object of the game is to pick up patients and race them to the hospital. There is a limited amount of time to deliver the patients to the hospital and you must avoid the different obstacles on different levels. ==References== Category:1983 video games Category:Texas Instruments TI-99/4A games Category:Video games developed in the United States ==External Links== * Piselated Arcade: Ambulance * TI-99/4A-Pedia: Ambulance * TI-99ers On-line User Group: TI-99 Cartridge Listing * TI-99/4A Video Game House: Ambulance
title: Ambulance (video game)
